alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Union (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 6:41PM MDT until August 06 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Union County in northeastern New Mexico... Eastern Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 641 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Des Moines, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Des Moines, Folsom, Grenville, Mount Dora and Capulin. This includes Highway 64 between Mile Markers 377 and 420. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
